category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_convert_text_file
preference.preference_description: Indicates if the system has to convert the EOF marker while transferring a file of a dataset. Valid values are 0/1. 0 - Do not convert but transfer the file as is. 1 - Convert text file when transferring a file from/to client to/from server.
